description: Bo Summers and Cutter West have been together for a year. Things started out great but over time, got worse. And the only thing these two now have in common is sex ... nothing will quell their arguing than sucking down each other's big dicks; plus Bo's asshole twitching to be licked and then fucked until Cutter makes him cum. The big man soon adds his own spurts of spooge to the mix. They finally acknowledge that the best part about fighting is the make-up sex ... so it's anybody's guess how long before they're ready to go another round.
title: Hot Cargo, Scene #01
